title.value: Automated Detection of Ileocecal Valve, Appendiceal Orifice, and Polyp During Colonoscopy using a Deep Learning Model
title.justification: The title of the paper is stated at the beginning and throughout the paper.
title.quote: AUTOMATED DETECTION OF ILEOCECAL VALVE, APPENDICEAL ORIFICE, AND POLYP DURING COLONOSCOPY USING A DEEP LEARNING MODEL

extractions.description: The paper discusses the development and validation of a deep convolutional neural network (DCNN) model for automatic identification and differentiation of anatomical landmarks during colonoscopy.

type.justification: The paper presents an empirical study where a DCNN model is trained, validated, and tested on annotated colonoscopy video frames.
type.quote: We aimed to develop and test a deep convolutional neural network (DCNN) model that can automatically identify ICV and AO, and differentiate these landmarks from normal mucosa and colorectal polyps.

name.justification: The research focuses on using deep learning for identifying anatomical landmarks in colonoscopy images.
name.quote: AUTOMATED DETECTION OF ILEOCECAL VALVE, APPENDICEAL ORIFICE, AND POLYP DURING COLONOSCOPY USING A DEEP LEARNING MODEL

name.justification: The paper uses a deep convolutional neural network model, which falls under Deep Learning.
name.quote: We aimed to develop and test a deep convolutional neural network (DCNN) model...

name.justification: The application of the research is in detecting landmarks during colonoscopy, a procedure within Gastroenterology.
The model developed and tested is a deep convolutional neural network model.
name.quote: A DCNN classification model was developed, validated, and tested...

is_contributed.justification: The paper details the development and implementation of a new DCNN model for the study.
is_contributed.quote: A DCNN classification model was developed, validated, and tested...

is_executed.justification: The paper mentions the execution of the model on the dataset for training, validation, and testing.
is_executed.quote: We trained a DCNN AI model on... and validated and tested the model...

is_compared.justification: There is no mention of comparison with other models.
is_compared.quote: A DCNN classification model was developed, validated, and tested...

referenced_paper_title.value: Automated Detection of Ileocecal Valve, Appendiceal Orifice, and Polyp During Colonoscopy using a Deep Learning Model
referenced_paper_title.justification: The model is presented in this particular study, hence the reference is to this paper itself.
referenced_paper_title.quote: A DCNN classification model was developed, validated, and tested...

name.justification: The dataset consists of annotated frames extracted from colonoscopy videos for training, validation, and testing.
name.quote: ...collected annotated full-length colonoscopy videos of 318 patients undergoing outpatient colonoscopies.

referenced_paper_title.value: Automated Detection of Ileocecal Valve, Appendiceal Orifice, and Polyp During Colonoscopy using a Deep Learning Model
referenced_paper_title.justification: The dataset was specifically created for this study.
referenced_paper_title.quote: We created three non-overlapping training, validation, and test datasets with 25,444 unaltered frames extracted from the colonoscopy videos...
